Name: Allura: Curse of the Mermaid
About the game: Help the mermaid Allura to find all clues to solve her mysterious origin in this amazing underwater Match3 adventure! - An exciting story of romance and adventure, following a young mermaid seeking to discover her past - Five chapters and twenty upgrades to take you from the familiar world on land to a new world deep under the sea - Challenging match-3 puzzles as you follow Alluraâ€™s story - A colorful cast of characters to meet as Allura crosses paths with new friends and enemies both above the sea and below - 20 exciting upgrades Also Play Part 2 of the Mermaid Saga: /
